TopicTitle: [MKS ]Do resources "run out" in KSP? e.g. Gypsum

Articles.Content: Title says it all but if you set up a base on the Mun for example with a sweet spot of Gypsum for fertilizer, do the minerals eventually run out and therefore none get generated by the drill or is it infinite? The MKS wiki to my knowledge doesnt state anything about this.

It's not a MKS thing, so the wiki doesn't cover it.  It's just stock, and in general no, they don't.  (I think there is support that they could, but I don't know of any mods that make use of that.  CRP resources like Gypsum definitely don't.)
